courseSectionInformation: M.S. candidates, 0 to 8 graduate hours. Doctoral candidates, 0 to 16 graduate hours. Approved for S/U grading only. May be repeated. MS students must submit a "Request to Enroll in LIS 599 - Master's Thesis" form.
